Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that directly lead to Request Payment without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears in variants that do not include any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurring after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to after Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that originate from a resubmission after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of total process executions where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is the last approval step before Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that are preceded by at least one rejection (by any role) in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER earlier in the sequence
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to the frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is reached without any prior rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that immediately follow Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, excluding paths involving BUDGET OWNER or PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of all approval-related activities that are Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that complete successfully (i.e., end with Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurrences that are part of the three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears in cases that had exactly one submission attempt (no resubmissions after rejection)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that occur within variants where the pre-approver was bypassed entirely
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of variants ending in Payment Handled with Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR but without any involvement of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, relative to all successful variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities
